cogs.label: A Browser
cogs.lpDescription: Your website is the front door to your sales and marketing process. Don't just test your website in isolation: validate that you're capturing the right data in the right systems.
cogs.name: automatoninc/web

useCases.title: Lead Generation Form QA
useCases.description: Fill out a form, then check Marketing Automation for the lead.
useCases.steps:
- step: Given I navigate to https://example.com
- step: When I enter {{test}} into input[name=Email]
- step: And I submit the form by clicking button[value=Subscribe]
- step: Then the source field on Marketo Lead {{test}} should be Web

useCases.title: Marketing Tag and Pixel QA
useCases.description: Perform a key action, then check that a tag fired.
useCases.steps:
- step: Given I navigate to https://example.com
- step: When I click the page element a.primary-cta
- step: Then Google Analytics should have tracked an event with category Link and action Click for tracking ID UA-1234-5

cogs.label: An Inbox (Mailgun)
cogs.lpDescription: Who cares if your email is pixel-perfect when the program that sends it is misfiring? Automatically QA your welcome, confirmation, nurture, and drip campaigns.
cogs.name: automatoninc/inbox-mailgun

useCases.title: Email Onboarding Program QA
useCases.description: Make sure your onboarding program gets kicked off immediately.

useCases.title: Email Personalization QA
useCases.description: Make sure your template tokens get replaced correctly.
useCases.steps:
- step: When I enroll the {{test}} Hubspot contact into workflow Welcome Email Send
- step: Then the subject of the 1st mailgun email for {{test}} should be Welcome, Test Name
